Posts.Content: Jun 23, 2010 02:12PM tommyD wrote: Hi!!  I'm from Naperville, IL and we are total BlackHawk Fans here!  My son, (19 yrs.) has been their biggest fan ever since he was little so this was such a big year for us!!! My 20 year old daughter was able to experience the most awesome parade with the BlackHawks --  A total of 2 million people on the streets of Chic. -- what a memory for her!!   Bev
